name: d_customer__s4c
description: This table contains detailed information about customers, including personal details, contact information, and status.

columns.name: cif_number
columns.description: Unique identifier for the customer.

columns.name: partner_cif
columns.description: Identifier for the partner associated with the customer.

columns.name: religion
columns.description: The religion of the customer.

columns.name: registered_date
columns.description: The date when the customer registered.

columns.name: first_name_vn
columns.description: Customer's first name in Vietnamese.

columns.name: first_name_en
columns.description: Customer's first name in English.

columns.name: full_name_vn
columns.description: Customer's full name in Vietnamese.

columns.name: full_name_en
columns.description: Customer's full name in English.

columns.name: sector_code
columns.description: Code representing the sector the customer is involved in.

columns.name: lob
columns.description: The line of business the customer is associated with.

columns.name: gender
columns.description: The gender of the customer.

columns.name: marital_status
columns.description: The marital status of the customer.

columns.name: birth_date
columns.description: The birth date of the customer.

columns.name: identity_type
columns.description: The type of identity document the customer has.

columns.name: identity_number
columns.description: The number on the customer's identity document.

columns.name: identity_issued_place
columns.description: The place where the identity document was issued.

columns.name: identity_issued_date
columns.description: The date when the identity document was issued.

columns.name: identity_expired_date
columns.description: The expiration date of the identity document.

columns.name: passport_number
columns.description: The passport number of the customer.

columns.name: email
columns.description: The email address of the customer.

columns.name: phone_number
columns.description: The phone number of the customer.

columns.name: status
columns.description: The current status of the customer's account.

columns.name: nationality_code
columns.description: The nationality code of the customer.

columns.name: first_contact_date
columns.description: The date of the first contact with the customer.

columns.name: ex_identity_number
columns.description: The previous identity number of the customer.

columns.name: ex_passport_number
columns.description: The previous passport number of the customer.

columns.name: ex_email
columns.description: The previous email address of the customer.

columns.name: ex_phone_number
columns.description: The previous phone number of the customer.

columns.name: c_add_country
columns.description: The country of the customer's current address.

columns.name: c_add_province
columns.description: The province of the customer's current address.

columns.name: c_add_district
columns.description: The district of the customer's current address.

columns.name: c_add_ward
columns.description: The ward of the customer's current address.

columns.name: c_add_street
columns.description: The street of the customer's current address.

columns.name: c_add_detail
columns.description: Additional details of the customer's current address.

columns.name: c_add_full
columns.description: The full current address of the customer.

columns.name: r_add_country
columns.description: The country of the customer's registered address.

columns.name: r_add_province
columns.description: The province of the customer's registered address.

columns.name: r_add_district
columns.description: The district of the customer's registered address.

columns.name: r_add_ward
columns.description: The ward of the customer's registered address.

columns.name: r_add_street
columns.description: The street of the customer's registered address.

columns.name: r_add_detail
columns.description: Additional details of the customer's registered address.

columns.name: r_add_full
columns.description: The full registered address of the customer.

columns.name: tax_code
columns.description: The tax code of the customer.

columns.name: industry_code
columns.description: Code representing the industry the customer is involved in.

columns.name: customer_status
columns.description: The status of the customer in the system.

columns.name: customer_segment
columns.description: The segment classification of the customer.

columns.name: priority_class
columns.description: The priority class assigned to the customer.

columns.name: occupation
columns.description: The occupation of the customer.

columns.name: work_position
columns.description: The work position of the customer.

columns.name: post_code
columns.description: The postal code of the customer's address.

columns.name: payroll_company
columns.description: The company where the customer is employed.

columns.name: dlh_created_time
columns.description: Timestamp when the record was created.

columns.name: dlh_partition_date
columns.description: Date used for partitioning the data.

columns.name: dlh_source
columns.description: The source from which the data was obtained.

columns.name: dlh_processed_time
columns.description: Timestamp when the data was processed.

columns.name: year
columns.description: The year related to the data entry.

columns.name: month
columns.description: The month related to the data entry.

columns.name: day
columns.description: The day related to the data entry.
